mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND MEMBER_STATUS='N'
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} AND MEMBER_STATUS='N'

SELECT P.*, S.SUBSCRIBE_DATE, I.ITEM_NAME FROM POINT P JOIN SUBSCRIBE S ON (P.SUBSCRIBE_NO = S.SUBSCRIBE_NO) JOIN ITEM I ON (I.ITEM_NO = S.ITEM_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(S.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT * FROM REVIEW WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC

SELECT E.*, I.ITEM_NAME FROM EXCHANGE E JOIN SUBSCRIBE S ON (E.SUBSCRIBE_NO = S.SUBSCRIBE_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (S.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN ITEM I ON (S.ITEM_NO = I.ITEM_NO) WHERE S.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY E.EXCHANGE_DATE DESC
SELECT D.*, I.ITEM_NAME, S.SUBSCRIBE_DATE, S.EXCHANGE_STATUS FROM DELIVERY D JOIN SUBSCRIBE S ON (D.SUBSCRIBE_NO = S.SUBSCRIBE_NO) JOIN ITEM I ON (S.ITEM_NO = I.ITEM_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT C.*, I.IMAGE_PATH, I.IMAGE_RENAME FROM CART C LEFT JOIN ITEM I ON (C.ITEM_NO = I.ITEM_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EXCHANGE VALUES(SEQ_EXCHANGE.NEXTVAL, DEFAULT, #{exchangeContent}, SYSDATE, #{subscribeNo}, #{exchangeCategory})
mapper.update: UPDATE SUBSCRIBE SET EXCHANGE_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE SUBSCRIBE_NO=#{subscribeNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IMAGE I WHERE I.IMAGE_NO = (SELECT RI.R_IMAGE_NO FROM REVIEW_IMAGE RI WHERE I.IMAGE_NO = RI.R_IMAGE_NO AND RI.REVIEW_NO=#{reviewNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET EMAIL=#{email}, ADDRESS_1=#{address1}, ADDRESS_2=#{address2}, ADDRESS_3=#{address3}, MODIFY_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN INQUIRY I ON (B.BOARD_NO = I.BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_CODE='O' AND MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}
SELECT H.*, T.ITEM_PRICE, T.IMAGE_PATH, T.IMAGE_RENAME,T.ITEM_NAME FROM HEART H LEFT JOIN ITEM T ON (H.ITEM_NO = T.ITEM_NO) WHERE H.MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{email}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{gender}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL=#{email}
DELETE FROM CART WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} AND CART_NO=#{cartNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND MEMBER_NAME=#{memberName} AND EMAIL=#{email}

SELECT * FROM GRADE
ORDER BY GRADE_NO DESC

SELECT count(*) from( select * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_STATUS='N' )
MEMBER_NO LIKE '%${memberNo}%'
OR MEMBER_ID LIKE '%${memberId}%'
OR MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%${memberName}%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_STATUS='N') GROUP BY GRADE_NO HAVING GRADE_NO=#{gradeNo}

select * from( SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_STATUS='N' ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC )
MEMBER_NO LIKE '%${memberNo}%'
OR MEMBER_ID LIKE '%${memberId}%'
OR MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%${memberName}%'
SELECT * FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN SECESSION S ON(M.MEMBER_NO=S.MEMBER_NO) WHERE M.MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}
SELECT PAYMENT_DATE, ITEM_NAME, AMOUNT, ((ITEM_PRICE*AMOUNT)-POINT) AS TOTAL_PAYMENT FROM PAYLIST WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM SECESSION GROUP BY SECESSION_CATEGORY HAVING SECESSION_CATEGORY=#{secessionCategory}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM SECESSION S LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(S.MEMBER_NO=M.MEMBER_NO) GROUP BY GRADE_NO HAVING GRADE_NO=#{gradeNo}

select * from( SELECT S.*,M.GRADE_NO, m.member_name FROM SECESSION S LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(S.MEMBER_NO=M.MEMBER_NO)
SECESSION_CATEGORY=#{category1}
)
MEMBER_NO LIKE '%${memberNo}%'
OR MEMBER_ID LIKE '%${memberId}%'
OR MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%${memberName}%'
OR SECESSION_CONTENT LIKE '%${category2}%'
SELECT S.*, I.ITEM_NAME FROM SUBSCRIBE S JOIN ITEM I ON (S.ITEM_NO = I.ITEM_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} AND SUBSCRIBE_STATUS='N'

SELECT S.*,I.*,M.ADDRESS_1,M.ADDRESS_2,M.ADDRESS_3,D.* FROM SUBSCRIBE S LEFT JOIN ITEM I ON(S.ITEM_NO=I.ITEM_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(S.MEMBER_NO=M.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN DELIVERY D ON(S.SUBSCRIBE_NO=D.SUBSCRIBE_NO) LEFT JOIN PAYMENT P ON(S.SUBSCRIBE_NO=P.SUBSCRIBE_NO) WHERE S.SUBSCRIBE_NO=#{subscribeNo}
SELECT * FROM PAYMENT P LEFT JOIN ITEM I ON(P.ITEM_NO=I.ITEM_NO) WHERE SUBSCRIBE_NO=#{subscribeNo}
SELECT SUM((ITEM_PRICE*AMOUNT)-POINT) AS TOTAL_PAYMENT FROM PAYMENT P LEFT JOIN ITEM I ON(P.ITEM_NO=I.ITEM_NO) GROUP BY SUBSCRIBE_NO HAVING SUBSCRIBE_NO=#{subscribeNo}
SELECT SUM((ITEM_PRICE*AMOUNT)-POINT) AS TOTAL_PAYMENT FROM PAYLIST GROUP BY MEMBER_NO HAVING MEMBER_NO=#{value}
SELECT SUM(ITEM_PRICE*AMOUNT) AS TOTAL_PAYMENT FROM PAYMENT P LEFT JOIN ITEM I ON(P.ITEM_NO=I.ITEM_NO) GROUP BY SUBSCRIBE_NO HAVING SUBSCRIBE_NO=#{subscribeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE SUBSCRIBE SET SUBSCRIBE_STATUS='Y' WHERE SUBSCRIBE_NO=#{subscribeNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT E.*,S.MEMBER_ID,I.ITEM_NAME FROM EXCHANGE E LEFT JOIN SUBSCRIBE S ON (E.SUBSCRIBE_NO=S.SUBSCRIBE_NO) LEFT JOIN ITEM I ON (S.ITEM_NO=I.ITEM_NO)
e.exchange_status=#{category1}
ORDER BY E.EXCHANGE_DATE DESC )
subscribe_no like '%${subscribeNo}%'
or exchange_content LIKE '%${word}%'
or member_Id LIKE '%${memberId}%'

select * from( SELECT e.*,i.item_name,s.member_id FROM EXCHANGE E LEFT JOIN SUBSCRIBE S ON(E.SUBSCRIBE_NO=S.SUBSCRIBE_NO) LEFT JOIN ITEM I ON (S.ITEM_NO=I.ITEM_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (S.MEMBER_NO=M.MEMBER_NO)
e.exchange_status=#{category1}
ORDER BY EXCHANGE_NO DESC )
subscribe_no like '%${subscribeNo}%'
or exchange_content LIKE '%${word}%'
or member_Id LIKE '%${memberId}%'

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDay},'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL-1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "SEARCHDATE" FROM DUAL
CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE(#{lastDay})+1) - TO_DATE(#{startDay})

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT PAYMENT_DATE,COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT P GROUP BY PAYMENT_DATE
HAVING PAYMENT_DATE >= #{startDay} AND PAYMENT_DATE <= #{lastDay})

SELECT TO_CHAR(#{lastDay})-LEVEL+1 AS "SEARCHDATE" FROM DUAL
CONNECT BY LEVEL <= ((TO_CHAR(#{lastDay})+1)-TO_CHAR(#{startDay}))

SELECT * FROM(SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDay},'YYYY-MM') + LEVEL-1, 'YYYY-MM') AS "SEARCHDATE" FROM DUAL
CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE(#{lastDay},'YYYY-MM')+1) - TO_DATE(#{startDay},'YYYY-MM'))
GROUP BY SEARCHDATE ORDER BY SEARCHDATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT M.*,S.SECESSION_CONTENT FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN SECESSION S ON(M.MEMBER_NO=S.MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_STATUS='Y'
SECESSION_CATEGORY=#{category1}
)
MEMBER_NO LIKE '%${memberNo}%'
OR MEMBER_ID LIKE '%${memberId}%'
OR MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%${memberName}%'
OR SECESSION_CONTENT LIKE '%${category2}%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VISITOR WHERE TO_DATE(VISIT_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')=TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VISITOR
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE ENROLL_DATE=#{value}
SELECT count(*) FROM VISITOR WHERE TO_CHAR(VISIT_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{value}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM EXCHANGE WHERE EXCHANGE_STATUS='N' ORDER BY EXCHANGE_NO ASC )
WHERE ROWNUM<5

SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM SUBSCRIBE S LEFT JOIN DELIVERY D ON(S.SUBSCRIBE_NO=D.SUBSCRIBE_NO) left join item i on(s.item_no=i.item_no) WHERE S.SUBSCRIBE_STATUS='N' AND S.SUBSCRIBE_STATUS='N' ORDER BY S.SUBSCRIBE_NO ASC )
WHERE ROWNUM<5

SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM BOARD B
LEFT JOIN INQUIRY I ON(B.BOARD_NO=I.BOARD_NO) WHERE I.INQUIRY_YN='N' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO ASC )
WHERE ROWNUM<5

SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM BOARD B WHERE BOARD_CODE='N' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM<5
mapper.update: UPDATE SUBSCRIBE SET SUBSCRIBE_STATUS='Y' WHERE SUBSCRIBE_NO=#{subscribeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SUBSCRIBE WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} AND SUBSCRIBE_STATUS='N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CART WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POINT P JOIN SUBSCRIBE S ON (P.SUBSCRIBE_NO = S.SUBSCRIBE_NO) JOIN ITEM I ON (I.ITEM_NO = S.ITEM_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(S.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET POINT=#{point} WHERE MEMBER_NO=(SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM SUBSCRIBE WHERE SUBSCRIBE_NO=#{subscribeNo})
mapper.select: SELECT P.POINT FROM SUBSCRIBE S LEFT JOIN POINT P ON(S.SUBSCRIBE_NO=P.SUBSCRIBE_NO) WHERE S.SUBSCRIBE_NO=#{value}
